## Symposium Registration

Researchers from all institutions are welcome to register; however, please note that in-person attendance is required. Complimentary lunch will be provided for reservations made by March 12. The registration link is attached in the bottom of home page, you can also register here: [**Click here to register for Symposium 2025!**](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeFLIrPz0kwp0TFKJLpNdbs3dYRzF0t8hcry2C_JRePVRLMSw/viewform?usp=header).

---------------------------------------------------------------------

## Poster Registration

In addition to the oral presentations, we're thrilled to introduce a brand-new Student Poster Presentation Award this year! We wholeheartedly encourage every student to participate and showcase their innovative work, and we welcome all institutions in this area to join in. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to showcase your work! If you want to participate poster session, [**please click here**](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSetdMwOBPiGi2psZv-bDyl0oIrOypKEIot5OxC7KKEKs2PI8g/viewform?usp=header) and register by March 12.

------------------------------------------------------------------------


Please register the symposium before [**March 12th**]{style="color:blue;"}! If you are interested in poster session, please submit the poster session registration before [**March 12th**]{style="color:blue;"}!
